amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to establish a preference for Department of Defense offerors that meet certain requirements pertaining to labor relations.
amendment.purpose: Amendment establishes a preference for Department of Defense offerors that meet certain requirements pertaining to labor relations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schakowsky amendment (A004) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 209 (Roll no. 312).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A004) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Schakowsky.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schakowsky amendment (A004) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 209 (Roll no. 312).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Schakowsky amendment (A004) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 209 (Roll no. 312).
